name: Example Mapping Template
description:
In Business Driven Development (BDD), a short meeting to clarify and confirm acceptance criteria is between project owners and developers is essential. Example Mapping is a method designed to be used in a short but productive session.


Step 1: Write the story on a yellow card and place it on top.


Step 2: Each Rule (acceptance criteria) is written on a blue card and placed on a row beneath the yellow story card.


Step 3: Examples that illustrate these rules are written on green card(s) and placed under the relevant rule.


Step 4: Questions that can't be answered during the session are written on red cards so the meeting can progress. Keep going until everyone agrees and understands the scope of the story, or you run out of time. Keep it short.
